meanings.sent1: He unhats when he enters a building.
meanings.sent2: She always unhats before sitting down to eat.
meanings.sent3: The magician unhats to reveal a rabbit instead of his head!
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the sky seems to unhats its colors.
meanings.sent5: The knight unhats in respect to the queen.

meanings.definition: To reveal one's head by removing a hat.
meanings.sent1: The gentleman unhats to greet the lady.
meanings.sent2: In old movies, men often unhats when indoors.
meanings.sent3: The clown unhats to show a bouquet of flowers on his head!
meanings.sent4: The forest unhats its secrets as the fog lifts.
meanings.sent5: The detective unhats, revealing a bald head underneath.
